experience.title: Freelance Software Developer
experience.description: Developed custom Python tools for managing large-scale server fleets; built Selenium-based automation; wrote pytest and unittest suites; integrated Yandex Alice with smart-home projects; developed Flask-based components (Teplomonitor) with MySQL and PostgreSQL; created Selenium automation tests for ERP systems (MSSQL) and improved Perl/Mojolicious-based applications; performed project management and system administration; created data transfer tools from 1C:Enterprise to MSSQL for OLAP.

experience.title: Product Manager
experience.description: Managed RosYama project development; coordinated between users, lawyers, Megaplan programmers, system administrators and donors; built a stable user base and a forum-based self-moderated community; liaised with Moscow city authorities for integration with mos.ru.

experience.title: QA Team Leader
experience.description: Developed automated testing framework for 1C:Enterprise 8.0; created ~1000 automated tests; contributed to localization and testing in Russian, English and Hebrew.

experience.title: Head of IT Department
experience.description: Led IT operations; built and managed IT infrastructure; implemented Bugzilla, CVS and internal Wiki (Waka Wiki); implemented 1C:Enterprise integration; supported and nurtured IT processes and developer community.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Developed new features for 1C:Enterprise using its internal programming language; worked on MSSQL-based distributed networks; integrated 1C code storage with version control; contributed to CVS and Git workflows.
